"002"	My darling 	,
"003"	To cherished 	,
"004"	Dearest 	,

"006"	To popular Mr. 	,
"007"	How about you, 	?
"008"	To my friend, 	,
"009"	I have to say, 	...

"005"	Para 	:

"009"	Debo confesarte algo:
